attributes.action: FA made to show England Football games on Free to air television via BBC or ITV
attributes.background: The latest UEFA National League games are only available if you pay Sky. FA should tell UEFA they will not join any competition where the public can't watch the games for free.

rejection.details:
This is not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the FA.

You could start a new petition calling for the list of sporting events which have to be shown on free-to-air terrestrial television to be changed to include all England games in the Nations League if that is something you would like to see happen.
